附录：作品列表

Show Boat  🇺🇸 (1927): ‘‘Can’t Help Lovin’ Dat Man’’

Anything Goes  🇺🇸 (1934): ‘‘You’re the Top’’ & ‘‘Anything Goes’’

Oklahoma!  🇺🇸 (1943): ‘‘Many a New Day’’, ‘‘Out of My Dreams’’, & ‘‘The Farmer and the Cowman’’

Carousel  🇺🇸 (1945): ‘‘The Carousel Waltz’’

Kiss Me, Kate  🇺🇸 (1948): ‘‘Wunderbar’’, ‘‘So in Love’’, ‘‘We Open in Venice’’, & ‘‘Brush Up Your Shakespeare’’

South Pacific  🇺🇸 (1949): ‘‘Some Enchanted Evening’’, ‘‘Bali Ha’i’’ (2), ‘‘Some Enchanted Evening (Reprise)’’, ‘‘You’ve Got to Be Carefully Taught’’, & ‘‘This Nearly Was Mine’’ (1+1)

Guys and Dolls  🇺🇸 (1950): ‘‘Fugue for Tinhorns’’ & ‘‘I’ve Never Been in Love Before’’

The King and I  🇺🇸 (1951): ‘‘Hello, Young Lovers’’, ‘‘Something Wonderful’’, ‘‘I Have Dreamed’’, & ‘‘Shall We Dance?’’

My Fair Lady  🇺🇸 (1956): ‘‘Overture’’, ‘‘Why Can’t the English?’’, ‘‘Wouldn’t It Be Loverly?’’, ‘‘With a Little Bit of Luck’’ (1+1), ‘‘I’m an Ordinary Man’’, ‘‘Just You Wait’’, ‘‘I Could Have Danced All Night’’ (2), ‘‘Ascot Gavotte’’, ‘‘On the Street Where You Live’’ (2), ‘‘The Embassy Waltz’’, ‘‘Show Me’’, & ‘‘Get Me to the Church on Time’’

West Side Story  🇺🇸 (1957): ‘‘Prologue’’, ‘‘Mambo’’, ‘‘Tonight (Balcony Scene)’’, ‘‘America’’, ‘‘One Hand, One Heart’’, ‘‘Tonight (Quintet)’’, ‘‘I Feel Pretty’’, ‘‘Gee, Officer Krupke’’, & ‘‘A Boy Like That/I Have a Love’’

The Sound of Music  🇺🇸 (1959): ‘‘Morning Hymn (‘Dixit Dominus’)’’, ‘‘The Sound of Music’’, ‘‘My Favorite Things’’, ‘‘The Lonely Goatherd’’ (1+1), ‘‘Ländler’‘, & ‘‘Edelweiss’’

Fiddler on the Roof  🇺🇸 (1964): ‘‘Tradition’’, ‘‘Matchmaker, Matchmaker’’, ‘‘If I Were a Rich Man’’ (1+1), ‘‘To Life (L’Chaim)’’, ‘‘Tevye’s Dream’’, ‘‘Sunrise, Sunset’’ (1+1), ‘‘The Wedding Dance’’, ‘‘Do You Love Me?’’, ‘‘Far from the Home I Love’’, & ‘‘Anatevka’’

Cabaret  🇺🇸 (1966): ‘‘Willkommen’’, ‘‘Tomorrow Belongs to Me’’, ‘‘Maybe This Time’’, ‘‘Money’’, ‘‘Married’’, ‘‘I Don’t Care Much’’, & ‘‘Married’’

Company  🇺🇸 (1970): ‘‘You Could Drive a Person Crazy’’

A Little Night Music  🇺🇸 (1973): ‘‘Send In the Clowns’’ (1+2)

Chicago  🇺🇸 (1975): '’All That Jazz’’ (2) & ‘‘We Both Reached for the Gun’’

Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street  🇺🇸 (1979): ‘‘Prelude: The Ballad of Sweeney Todd’’, ‘‘The Worst Pies in London’’, ‘‘My Friends’’, ‘‘The Ballad of Sweeney Todd (Reprises 1–6)’’, ‘‘Green Finch and Linnet Bird’’, ‘‘Kiss Me (Quartet)’’, ‘‘Pretty Women’’, ‘‘Epiphany’’, ‘‘A Little Priest’’, & ‘‘Not While I’m Around’’

Les Misérables  🇫🇷🇬🇧 (1980/5): ‘‘I Dreamed a Dream’’ (2), ‘‘Fantine’s Death’’, ‘‘The Confrontation’’, ‘‘Do You Hear the People Sing?’’, ‘‘On My Own’’ (2+1), ‘‘Drink with Me’’, ‘‘A Little Fall of Rain’’, ‘‘Bring Him Home’’, ‘‘Empty Chairs at Empty Tables’’, ‘‘Valjeabn’s Death’’, & ‘‘Epilogue: Do You Hear the People Sing? (Reprise)’’

Cats  🇬🇧 (1981): ‘‘Gus: The Theatre Cat’’ & ‘‘Memory’’ (1+1)

Merrily We Roll Along  🇺🇸 (1981): ‘‘Not a Day Goes By’’

Sunday in the Park with George  🇺🇸 (1984): ‘‘Finishing the Hat’’, ‘‘Sunday’’, ‘‘Children and Art’’, ‘‘Lesson #8’’, & ‘‘Move On’’

Chess  🇬🇧 (1984/6): ‘‘Chess’’ & ‘‘Someone Else’s Story’’

The Phantom of the Opera  🇬🇧 (1985/6): ‘‘Wishing You Were Somewhere Here Again’’, ‘‘Wandering Child’’, & ‘‘The Point of No Return’’

Miss Saigon  🇬🇧 (1989): ‘‘Overture’’, ‘‘I Still Believe’’, ‘‘Thuy’s Death/This Is the Hour’’, ‘‘I’d Give My Life for You’’, ‘‘Bui-Doi’’, & ‘‘Too Much for One Heart’’

Sunset Boulevard  🇬🇧 (1991/3): ‘‘Surrender’’, ‘‘The Perfect Year’’, & ‘‘Sunset Boulevard’’

Elisabeth  🇦🇹 (1992): ‘‘Prolog’’, ‘‘Wie du’’, ‘‘Der letzte Tanz’’, ‘‘Ich gehör nur mir’’, ‘‘Kitsch!’’, ‘‘Ist das num dein Lohn (Bellaria)’’, ‘‘Die Schatten werden länger’’, ‘‘Rudolf, wo bist du? (Totenklage)’’, ‘‘Boote in der Nacht’’, & ‘‘An Deck der sinkenden Welt’’

Kristina från Duvemåla  🇸🇪 (1996): ‘‘Du måste finnas’’

Notre-Dame de Paris  🇫🇷 (1998): ‘‘Florence’’

Wicked  🇺🇸 (2003): ‘‘Popular’’ & ‘‘Defying Gravity’’

Rebecca  🇦🇹 (2006): '’Sie ergibt sich nicht’’ & '’Rebecca’’

Love Never Dies  🇬🇧 (2010): ‘‘’Til I Hear You Sing’’

item.title: 「不严肃音乐」情人节特辑
item.description:
下方歌单收录了十二首角度各异、艺术性与教育意义俱佳的爱情歌曲（依创作时间由近至远为序）

  • 点击标题开始听歌（「夜のボート」跳至舞台录像 128:20 处）
  • 歌曲语言由词作者后的小旗标注

Sama wciąż

作曲：Claude-Michel Schönberg
原词：Herbert Kretzmer
译词：Daniel Wyszogrodzki  🇵🇱
演出：Malwina Kusior  (2012 | 华沙 Teatr Muzyczny ROMA)

Wo bleibt da das Glück?

作曲：Richard Rodgers
原词：Oscar Hammerstein II
译词：[uncred.]  🇩🇪
演出：Franziska Becker & Hubert Wild  (2012 | 萨尔茨堡 Salzburger Landestheater)

Inte jag  

作曲：Benny Andersson & Björn Ulvaeus
原词：Tim Rice & Björn Ulvaeus
新词：Björn Ulvaeus  🇸🇪
演出：Helen Sjöholm  (2003 | 斯德哥尔摩 Cirkus)

夜のボート  

作曲：Sylvester Levay
原词：Michael Kunze
译词：小池修一郎  🇯🇵
演出：一路真輝 ’68  &  石川禅  (2012 | 東京国際フォーラムホールC)

淯水吟

作曲：谷建芬
作词：王健  🇨🇳
录唱：毛阿敏  (1994)

J’avais rêvé

作曲：Claude-Michel Schönberg
作词：Alain Boublil  🇫🇷
录唱：Louise Pitre  (1991)

Not a Day Goes By

词曲：Stephen Sondheim  🇺🇸
演出：Bernadette Peters  (1998 | 伦敦 Royal Festival Hall)

Entremetteuse

作曲：Jerry Bock
原词：Sheldon Harnick
译词：Maurice Vidalin  🇫🇷
演出：Sarah Manesse, Maeva Mathon, & France Renard  (2017 | 巴黎 Studio 105 de la Maison de la Radio)

Married (Reprise)

作曲：John Kander
作词：Fred Ebb  🇺🇸
演出：Ron Rifkin & Mary Louise Wilson  (1998 | 纽约 Henry Miller’s Theatre)

I’m an Ordinary Man

作曲：Frederick Loewe
作词：Alan Jay Lerner  🇺🇸
演出：Rex Harrison  (1959 | 伦敦 Theatre Royal, Drury Lane)

I Hate Men

词曲：Cole Porter  🇺🇸
演出：Rachel York  (2003 | 伦敦 Victoria Palace Theatre)

It’s a Scandal! It’s an Outrage!

作曲：Richard Rodgers
作词：Oscar Hammerstein II  🇺🇸
演出：Peter Polycarpou  (1999 | 伦敦 Royal National Theatre)
